title: Tom Brady's free agency frenzy has already begun, Players who could use a change of scenery (Football 3/3)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to address the latest Tom Brady rumors and how they could affect this offseason's QB carousel (6:00). The guys also discuss the possibility of the Jaguars trading Nick Foles (28:15), before assessing potential franchise tags for A.J. Green, Bud Dupree, Brandon Scherff and Yannick Ngakoue. Finally, Will, John and Sean list their 'Top 5 Players Who Could Use a Change of Scenery' (53:30).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
